thread.section_title: Paris Orly airport evacuated after shooting – Metro
thread.title: Paris Orly airport evacuated after shooting
thread.title_full: Paris Orly airport evacuated after shooting

author: Nicole Morley
title: Paris Orly airport evacuated after shooting
text:
Shots have been reported at Orly airport in Paris. 
The airport has been evacuated.
A man reportedly tried to snatch a soldier’s gun.
VIDEO: Evacuation in #Orly airport, Paris #ORY https://t.co/CTgmFHAb9X pic.twitter.com/R16d5btAsq 
— RT (RT_com) March 18, 2017
— Ivan (@Ivan226622) March 18, 2017 

This is a developing story and more information will be added.
